meanings.sent1: After eating too much candy, he chundered all over the floor.
meanings.sent2: She chundered after spinning around too fast on the playground.
meanings.sent3: The dog chundered up his dinner right before the guests arrived.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing river chundered down the mountainside, carrying debris with it.
meanings.sent5: The turbulent plane ride made him chundered into the airsick bag.

meanings.sent1: The sick child chundered in the bathroom, feeling relieved afterward.
meanings.sent2: She chundered on the bus, causing a commotion among the passengers.
meanings.sent3: The party clown accidentally chundered during his act, creating a messy situation.
meanings.sent4: The volcano chundered hot lava, causing destruction in its path.
meanings.sent5: The upset stomach made him chundered uncontrollably, seeking a bathroom urgently.
